description: Blackburn Rovers midfielder Darragh Lenihan extends his youth loan at League Two side Burton Albion for a third time.
title: Darragh Lenihan: Burton extend Blackburn midfielder's loan
title_page: Darragh Lenihan: Burton extend Blackburn midfielder's loan - BBC Sport
maintext:
Republic of Ireland Under-21 midfielder Darragh Lenihan has extended his youth loan at League Two promotion hopefuls Burton Albion for a third time.
The 20-year-old Blackburn Rovers player originally joined the Brewers in October and has now extended his stay until 14 March.
Lenihan has made 12 appearances for Albion, scoring one goal.
He is yet to make his senior debut for Blackburn, but has been an unused substitute at first-team level.
